item.description:
** UPDATE ** Alternate contact for this event (if Sacha can't make it): Ben (203) 554-5144

Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Barcelona (in the lounge area)

I discovered Barcelona almost a year ago, and it continues to be one of my favorite hot spots. The ambiance is really warm and inviting...the perfect place to cluster together on a cold February Monday with an amazing group of people!

Drink Specials:

$4 Budweiser draft
$6 Svedka martini
$5 off pitchers of Sangria

Food Specials:

6 tapas for $48...order with a group of friends; an excellent way to sample some delicious Spanish appetizers!



Your contact for this event is:
Sacha 802.310.7067

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***

Post-party location TBD
item.name: 2/4 Happy Hour at Barcelona's
